scripts.generate-unicorn-store-infrastructure-st: cd ./cdk && mvn clean package && cdk synth && cdk synth UnicornStoreInfrastructure --yaml --path-metadata false --version-reporting false | sed 's/arn:aws:iam::{{.AccountId}}:/!Sub arn:aws:iam::${AWS::AccountId}:/g' > ../cfn/UnicornStoreInfrastructure.yaml
